org.midica.ui.player.soundcheck

Class SoundcheckNoteModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<E>
      • javax.swing.DefaultListModel<NamedInteger>
        • org.midica.ui.player.soundcheck.SoundcheckNoteModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel<NamedInteger>

    public class SoundcheckNoteModel
extends javax.swing.DefaultListModel<NamedInteger>

    This class provides the model for the note/percussion list in the soundcheck window.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getPercussion()
      Determines if the list is currently loaded with chromatic notes or percussive instruments.
      void init()
      (Re)fills the note/percussion list with either notes or percussion instruments - depending on the percussion field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundcheckNoteModel

        public SoundcheckNoteModel()

        Creates a model for the note/percussion list.

    • Method Detail

      • setPercussion

        public void setPercussion(boolean newPercussion)

        Switches the display mode to display either notes or percussion instruments.

        In other words: sets the percussion field.

        Parameters:
        newPercussion - true to display percussion instruments, false to display notes.

      • getPercussion

        public boolean getPercussion()

        Determines if the list is currently loaded with chromatic notes or percussive instruments.

        Returns:
        true, if the list contains percussion instruments; otherwise: false

      • init

        public void init()

        (Re)fills the note/percussion list with either notes or percussion instruments - depending on the percussion field.
